alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone; Prairie; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:51PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, southwestern Roosevelt, southern Valley, McCone and northwestern Prairie Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 849 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles northwest of The Pines Rec Area to 8 miles northwest of Rock Creek Rec Area to near Nelson Creek Rec Area to 10 miles south of Flowing Wells Rest Area. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Circle, Nashua, Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Duck Creek Rec Area, Brockway, Fort Peck Marina, Frazer, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Oswego, Park Grove, The Bentonite Plant, Haxby, Weldon, Watkins and Whatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on Fort Peck Lake, a strong wind gust may create hazardous wave conditions.
